scripts.test-users: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha tests/users.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=tests/reports,reportFilename=users --timeout 5000 --exit
scripts.test-warehouses: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha tests/warehouses.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=tests/reports,reportFilename=users --timeout 5000 --exit
scripts.test-programs: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha tests/programs.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=tests/reports,reportFilename=users --timeout 5000 --exit
scripts.test-items: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha tests/items.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=tests/reports,reportFilename=users --timeout 5000 --exit
scripts.test-all: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha tests/*.test.js --reporter mochawesome --reporter-options reportDir=tests/reports,reportFilename=alltests --timeout 5000 --exit
